item.description: SpaceX is a major aerospace contractor. What happens when its objectives start to drift?

item.title: The Story Behind Macron’s Expensive Sunglasses
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron wore a pair of $770 aviators to Davos last month. Now sales are through the roof for the brand.

item.title: ‘Fix Your Shit’: Blue Diamond Almonds
item.description: The new column from Fast Company, ‘Fix Your Shit,’ challenges companies who’ve created problems—ranging from trivial to travesty—to ‘do better.’

item.title: There’s $1 Million Dollars of Free Chipotle Up for Grabs During the Super Bowl. Here’s How to Get It
item.description: A code will drop at some point after halftime and before the third quarter.
